mainText:
Steve was always ahead of his time but that never stopped him. He should 
be remembered for what the younger generation can be capable of. Steve 
was once young like many of us and never stopped pursuing anything he 
wanted, we should all live like it is our last day. In the world we live 
in today where everything is connected, mostly thanks to Steve himself, 
we should always be creating and pursuing. His life will be celebrated.
author: Andrew
